inclusion.criterion: Patients with actual urinary retention dependent on Foley Catheter or Intermittent
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Inability to undergo bladder catheterization with the M3 due to anatomical challenges
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 62 yo male with hx of CVA, neurogenic bladder with indwelling suprapubic catheter with multiple prior admissions for UTIs, altered mental status, and urosepsis presents to the hospital in urosepsis now resolved after treatment with vanc/meropenem. Per CT there is a non-obstructing stone in the L ureter, no evidence of urethral strictures.
